metadata.title: CVE-2019-20202 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in ezXML 0.8.3 through 0.8.6. The functionezxml_char_content() tries to use realloc on a block that was notallocated, leading to an invalid free and segmentation fault.

criterions.comment: mapcache: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
scilab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
netcdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
navit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
